title: Cressida Bonas looks glamorous as she joins Dominic West at Harper's Bazaar Women of The Year Awards
text:
She always looks sensational whenever she steps out to enjoy London's social scene.

And fashion favourite Cressida Bonas, 30, cut a glamorous figure as she attended the Harper's Bazaar Women Of The Year Awards in London on Tuesday.

The ex-girlfriend of Prince Harry appeared to be in good spirits as she laughed and posed for pictures with a dapper looking Dominic West, 50.

Looking good: Cressida Bonas, 30, cut a glamorous figure as she joined a dapper looking Dominic West, 50, at the Harper's Bazaar Women of the Year Awards in London on Tuesday

Cressida opted for an elegant sparkling black velvet jumpsuit with a bow satin trim for the bash at Claridge's Hotel.

She looked stunning in the velvet one-piece which had a delicate silver sequinned effect and completed her look with art deco-inspired black diamond earrings.

The model also accessorised with a black clutch bag and wore her blonde tresses half up and half down styling the tied back portion into a chic do.

Stylish: The model and actress opted for a black velvet jumpsuit with a touch of sparkle

Actor Dominic West also pulled out all the stops for the evening and looked dapper in a black suit and crisp white shirt.

The Wire actor kept his accessories classic with smart black shoes and a bow tie.

Cressida and Dominic appeared to be enjoying each other's company as they laughed and smiled inside the five-star hotel.

Pals: Dominic and Cressida appeared to be having a great time as they laughed and joked with each other at the event

Glam: Cressida accessorised with statement black earrings and a matching clutch bag

The pair have been friends for a number of years and were seen sharing a hug and a welcoming air kiss in 2016 when they both attended a pre-BAFTA party.

Dominic has been married to film producer Catherine Fitzgerald since 2010 and they have four children together.

While Cressida announced in August that she has got engaged to estate agent Harry Wentworth-Stanley.

Elegant: The beauty's jumpsuit boasted a satin trim down the front which tied at the waist

In a romantic image uploaded to Harry's account, actress Cressida was seen cuddling him as she showed off her dazzling diamond ring.

The photograph, which they posed for while standing on a grassy knoll in Nantucket, Massachusetts, was simply captioned by Harry: 'We getting married.'

Cressida first dated Harry, an old Harrovian and the son of the Marchioness of Milford Haven, before her romance with Prince Harry and they reunited in 2017.

Stunning: Cressida, who used to date Prince Harry, announced in August that she is now engaged to estate agent Harry Wentworth-Stanley

Also seen at the star-studded event on Tuesday was model Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, fashion star Alexa Chung and former model Sophie Dahl.

The event will see actress Cate Blanchett, 50, receive a Philanthropy Award for her work on women's rights through movements such as Time's Up and #MeToo.

Cate has also worked as a Goodwill Ambassador for the United Nations High Commissioner For Refugees, which helps protect refugees all around the world.
description: Cressida Bonas, 30, opted for a velvet jumpsuit with a bow trim for the event at Claridge's Hotel in London. She was joined at the awards by The Wire actor Dominic West, 50, who looked dapper in a suit.
